name: Ninja Teleport
description:
You play as a ninja assassin fighter.
Use rpg games stealth approach and kill all ninja enemies.
Sneak and wait for good opportunity to hit zombie in right moment.
Mortal zombies will try to crush you with assassin creed infinity blade.
Every zombie ninja has different abilities
Your assassin ninja has through learning of kung fu, martial arts, fighting and killing skills, sniper games.
These epic fighting games contain many levels.
Let’s be a legendary best ninja warrior and start thrilling sword fighting adventure with bravery and courage.
Push back all your fears because you are going to hunter fight with the deadliest zombie warriors.
A fascinating best ninja warrior fighting games with elements of action, rpg games and zombie apocalypse.
In this samurai assassin fighting games a shadow fighter has very dangerous demons to fight.
Let’s unleash your samurai fighting abilities. This is epic action 3D games.
In this ninja assassin fighting games, a hitman ninja can use a variety of weapons, equipments to attack enemies.
So, prove yourself as a real warrior and rpg hitman sniper.
Epic adventure with amazing action like stealth, combat fight, sword fight, archery shooting, blade fighting, destroy and kill.
